Html:
Would like to see something,  to take speaker out as input for speech recognition, instead of  file or audio input.

and take the text to speech out put to the audio input.

By the information on msndn, seems I may have to have to have the audio device output to impersonate an audio device input.

This is to run on the deaf persons pc to allow to be able to communicate with others in voice chat, such as teamspeak or ventrillo,  gotomeeting, and so on.
